testsuite.name: The user is able to create a new account in Councilbox

testcase.name: The user is able to create a new account in Councilbox Open the browser and enter the URL: https://app.councilbox.com/
testcase.classname: Open the browser and enter the URL: https://app.councilbox.com/

testcase.name: The user is able to create a new account in Councilbox Change language to Spanish
The user is able to create a new account in Councilbox Click on the 'Registarse' button
The user is able to create a new account in Councilbox Populate all required fields
The user is able to create a new account in Councilbox Click on the checkbox button to accept the 'términos y condiciones de councilbox'
testcase.classname: Click on the checkbox button to accept the 'términos y condiciones de councilbox'

testcase.name: The user is able to create a new account in Councilbox Click on the 'Enviar button'
The user is able to create a new account in Councilbox User should be registered successfully
The user is able to create a new account in Councilbox Open email application and navigate to the activation email
testcase.classname: Open email application and navigate to the activation email

testsuite.name: Councilbox login - valid username and password

testcase.name: Councilbox login - valid username and password Visits the Councilbox web page
Councilbox login - valid username and password Change language to Spanish
Councilbox login - valid username and password Enters email address
Councilbox login - valid username and password Enters password
Councilbox login - valid username and password Clicks login button
Log Out Opens dropdown in upper right corner
testcase.classname: Opens dropdown in upper right corner

testcase.name: Log Out Clicks logout
Log Out User successfully redirected to login page
testcase.classname: User successfully redirected to login page

testsuite.name: The user is able to restore a password

testcase.name: The user is able to restore a password Click on the 'Olvide mi contrasena?'' button
testcase.classname: Click on the 'Olvide mi contrasena?'' button

testcase.name: The user is able to restore a password Enter your Email and click on the 'Restablecer acceso' button
testcase.classname: Enter your Email and click on the 'Restablecer acceso' button

testcase.name: The user is able to restore a password Open your email application
The user is able to restore a password Back to Home page
